name: Gellen 4-in-1 Cuticle Pusher Pen with Micro-Dosin Oil, Cuticle Remover & Cuticle Oil in a Pen, Ceramic Nail Pusher Oil Pen for Hangnails & Dry & Damaged Nails, Nail Care Pen for Repair & Nourish Nails
short_description: Upgraded Cuticle Oil Pusher Pen: The cuticle remover pen combines a precision nail cuticle pusher (pink corundum /ceramic head) with an oil-infused core. Gently remove dead skin and hangnails while delivering micro-dosin oil to repair and condition nails & cuticles – all in one easy step, no mess. Due to only 3.5ml oils, trace amounts of essential oil will only penetrate through the tip of the pen. This pen is mainly used to remove dead skin/hangnails and may be less obvious effect on nourishing.

Premium Pink Corundum Grinding Head: Our nail buffer pen tip features rust-proof pink aluminum oxide for exceptional durability. Its uniquely fine, uniform grit provides smoother, gentler exfoliation than traditional metal pushers (ideal for beginners), effectively removing dead skin and smoothing rough edges without damage. Its 45°angled tip can provide the precision edge, improving 70% faster application. Micro-Dosin Oil seeps only to the tip as needed – no leaks or spills.

3.5ml Intensive Nourishment Oil Core: This cuticle oil core is packed with the blend of Grapeseed Oil, Keratin, Vitamin E, Jojoba Oil, PPG-10, BHA. It can soften the dead skin & hangnails, prevent nails brittleness & cracking, stimulate nail growth, repair & strengthen nails, renew cuticles for smoother, stronger, and shinier nails. A small amount of essential oil can have a significant effect.

4-in-1 Multi-Functional Nail Care: Our cuticle pusher pen offers four key benefits. It can remove dead skin/push back cuticles, lengthen nail beds, improve nail's shape; smooth the ridges & imperfections, boost shine, nourish cuticles; massage to renew dry, rough skin on hands and joints; safely dissolve leftover adhesive from acrylics/gel or natural nails. Glide it to remove without press; press to release micro-dosin oil to nourish nails. Achieve salon-perfect results at home.

Warm Tips: Before use, shake the pen 2-3 times and stand pen tip-down for 5-10 minutes to saturate the corundum head with oil. Compact 3.5ml oil reservoir releases micro-dosin oil slowly through the corundum tip – it's a controlled seep, not a free flow. Only the pen tip is moist. Not flow liquid. A little essential oil can easily remove dead skin without press. Press firmly against the nail plate to release micro-doses of oil to nourish nails. If you have any problems, please contact us anytime.

short_description: 【Sufficient Cuticle Oil Pen】 - You will get 100 pieces empty nail oil pen, 5 sheets of 120 sticker labels for differentiation. It’s sufficient quantity to meet your different purposes, daily use, replacement, travel or share with your family members or friends, etc.

Easy to classify and identify each cuticle oil pen with labeling stickers.

【HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL】- These transparent twist pens are crafted from high-quality PP material. They're disposable, hygienic, and non-toxic, featuring a clear design for easy content identification. The soft brush tip is perfect for applying to lips or nails, ensuring even coverage.

【EASY TO USE】- Simply inject the liquid into the cuticle oil pen, install the white brush tip, and then turn the pen clockwise until the liquid emerges. Remember to cover the pen cap after use. TIPS!!! Please DO NOT overfill the nail oil pen, to leave plenty room for the top brush to press in. Press firmly to seal the pen. DO NOT twist the empty pen to the top, it would be unable to twist back. Please DO NOT TRY TO TWIST BACK, it will damage the gear inside. The oil pen is disposable.

【WIDE APPLICATION】- These brush tip pens are suitable for thin or thick liquid, such as lip gloss, nail nutrition oil, eyelash growth cream, essential oil, teeth whitening, foundations, serums, acne spot treatment etc; It can be used as paint brush too.
